flawed_nl_solution:
Cody needs to read 54 books - 6 books - 3 books = <<54-6-3=54>>54 books.
Cody read 9 books each week after = 54 books / 9 books per week = <<54/9=6.0>>6.0 weeks.
Cody read for 1 week + 1 week + 6.0 weeks = <<1+1+6.0=8.0>>8.0 weeks total.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
